message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a fairer split. Take this offer before inflation eats your share!
Come on, meet me in the middle
Time is running out, and inflation is eating our money.  This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you another chance
The clock is ticking, Alice. This offer is a compromise, but I won't go lower.
